item.title: Who do you rather die? Michael Jackson and Iran
item.dc:creator: @fr33_t0_pk fr33_t0_pk
item.description:
@fr33_t0_pk wrote:

[quote=“joechilds2, post:10, topic:27438”][spam]lol =][/spam]

[ontopic] i dont have a clue who or what “iran” is lol [/ontopic][/quote]

do you know what a country is??

officially the Islamic Republic of Iran (Persian: جمهوری اسلامی ايران‎ ​, transliteration: Jomhūrī-ye Eslāmī-ye Īrān), and formerly known as Persia in the West, is a southwest Asian country located in the Middle East. Iran borders Armenia, Azerbaijan (including its Nakhichevan exclave) and Turkmenistan to the north, Pakistan and Afghanistan to the east, and Turkey and Iraq to the west. In addition, it borders the Persian Gulf, across which lie Kuwait, Iraq, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, and the United Arab Emirates. Shi’a Islam is the official state religion and Persian the official language.

Iran is one of the world’s oldest continuous major civilizations. The history of Iran covers thousands of years, throughout history, Iran has been of great geostrategic importance because of its central location in Eurasia. Iran is a founding member of the United Nations, NAM, OIC, and OPEC. Iran is also significant in international politics on account of its large supply of petroleum. The name Iran is a cognate of Aryan and literally means "Land of the

OFF WIKI BUT NOT THE PIC SOZ FOR CAPS

edit: there flag there emblem

item.title: Who do you rather die? Michael Jackson and Iran
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

What? Micheal Jackson is a completely normal person, well if you dont count his face. His voice is amazing and has some great music out in the world today. If you guys would judge him because of some accusations made to him, and judged him because of Michael Jackson, maybe we could stop all this hatred.

Also the molistation thing, you guys have no proof he touched any underaged children. Just an accusation and the media overinflating the issue.
